Dec 18, 2017

Sort order / option for product catalog in magento2 stores — Webnexs.com

Many of us have been wanting to update the products and sort it based on our requirements rather than a set of pre-defined/ designed scenarios. So keeping on the custom requirements, i would like to show you on how best you can sort the products by yourself on the catalog of Magento2.

Here are the steps to achieve the following. Please login to your magento admin
Step 1: Visit Products -> Categories.
Step 2: Categories -> Select Your Store view.
Step 3: Click Expand All.
Step 4: Click Category Products.
Step 5: Edit the “ To Position”

If you still have doubts, you can contact us through webnexs.com. Some one from our team should be assisting you on your queries.

Dec 14, 2017

What is IPTV ? Here are the benefits as well as classification of IPTV

The official definition of IPTV approved by the international telecommunication Union Focus Group is as follows: “IPTV is defined as multimedia services such as television/Video /audio/text/graphics/data delivered over IP (Internet Protocol) based networks managed to provide the required level of quality of service and experience, security, interactivity, and reliability”.

IPTV is a technique or system through which television services are broadcasted or delivered with the help of Internet Protocol Suite, it is delivered with packet switching network such as the internet, unlike traditional terrestrial, satellites signal and cable television formats.

Classification Of IPTV:

Live Streaming:

Live streaming is a process of live broadcasting as it happens.Live broadcasting media content is similar to watching a live television on the computer screen. In live television, we can’t pause or also can’t skip through the broadcast that doesn’t at all be interesting.

Video on demand:

Video on demand is similar to the playlist. In the video on demand Video clips as well as episodes are arranged by titles and categories like news, sports as well as music videos.

Originally published at webnexs.com on December 14, 2017.
